title: Number of cars on the road in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of cars in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of cars in millions is slightly increasing from 2001 to 2003.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2001 and 2002.
The highest Number of cars in millions, of value 29.0 was reached at Year 2003
Minimum Number of cars in millions about 27.8 was reached at Year 2001
min_summary: In general Number of cars in millions has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of cars in millions is slightly increasing from 2001 to 2003.
